body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Joshua Hall and I am a customer service representative at XYZ Car Dealership. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Martha. Before we proceed, could you please provide me with your date of birth in the format day, month, year?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my date of birth is two five zero four one nine seven eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha. One last piece of information we need for verification purposes: could you share the make and model of your car with us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, I drive a Toyota Camry.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Martha. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss regarding our services today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've been experiencing some issues with the recent maintenance service I availed at your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Martha. Let's address your concerns. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We appreciate your time and patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Martha. Have a great day!
